        Sets the overridden options for the flow to use at java runtime
        Parameters:
        overrideOptions - a map object that represents the json flow options that are to be used at runtime

        Sets the overridden step configs to use at java runtime

      • getStepById

        @Deprecated
Step getStepById(java.lang.String stepId)
        Deprecated. 
        Use getStep instead. "Id" is a misnomer here; this is expected to a map key.
        Parameters:
        stepId - id for the step
        Returns:
        a step
